Stephen Curry

Pronunciation: \STEFF-in\

Wardell Stephen Curry II ▪ Instagram: stephencurry30

(Steph, Baby-Faced Assassin, Chef Curry, The Human Torch, Threezus)

Position: Point Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-2, 185lb (188cm, 83kg)

Team: Golden State Warriors

Born: March 14, 1988 in Akron, Ohio us

Relatives: Brother Seth Curry; Brother-in-law Damion Lee; Father Dell Curry

College: Davidson

High School: Charlotte Christian in Charlotte, North Carolina

Draft: Golden State Warriors, 1st round (7th pick, 7th overall), 2009 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 28, 2009

Experience: 15 years

  • 10x All Star
  • 2x Scoring Champ
  • 2015-16 STL Champ
  • 4x NBA Champ
  • 10x All-NBA
  • 2009-10 All-Rookie
  • 2010-11 Sportsmanship
  • 2x MVP
  • NBA 75th Anniv. Team
  • 2021-22 AS MVP
  • 2021-22 WCF MVP
  • 2021-22 Finals MVP

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Stephen Curry?

Stephen Curry is 36 years old.

Where was Stephen Curry born?

Stephen Curry was born in Akron, Ohio.

When was Stephen Curry born?

Stephen Curry was born on March 14, 1988.

How tall is Stephen Curry?

Stephen Curry is 6-2 (188 cm) tall.

How much does Stephen Curry weigh?

Stephen Curry weighs 185 lbs (83 kg).

Is Stephen Curry in the Hall of Fame?

Stephen Curry is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Stephen Curry drafted?

Stephen Curry was drafted by Golden State Warriors, 1st round (7th pick, 7th overall), 2009 NBA Draft.

What position does Stephen Curry play?

Point Guard.

What is Stephen Curry's net worth?

Stephen Curry has made at least $357,844,681 playing professional basketball.

How much does Stephen Curry make?

Stephen Curry made $51,915,615 in 2024.

What does Stephen Curry average?

Stephen Curry averages 22.1 points, 4.6 rebounds, and 6.2 assists per game.

How many rings does Stephen Curry have?

Stephen Curry has won 4 championships.

What is Stephen Curry's Twitter account?

Stephen Curry is on Twitter at StephenCurry30.

What is Stephen Curry's Instagram account?

Stephen Curry is on Instagram at stephencurry30.

What schools did Stephen Curry attend?

Stephen Curry attended Charlotte Christian in Charlotte, North Carolina and Davidson.

What are Stephen Curry's nicknames?

Steph, Baby-Faced Assassin, Chef Curry, The Human Torch, Threezus are nicknames for Stephen Curry.
